page.title: 05A DAY IN MY LIFE 2
page.content: AFTER LUNCH WE HAVE PHYSICAL EDUCATION.AT 2.40 WE GET DRESSED AND HAVE AN INTERVAL.AFTER A SESSION OF PRIVATE READING,THE BELLRINGS FOR HOME TIME.ONCE HOME I REMOVE MY SCHOOL UNIFORM,DRESS IN JEANS AND SWEATER,AND GO OUT TO PLAY AT FOOTBALL OR SKATE-BOARDING.THE GIRLS IN OUR AVENUE PLAY AT PEEVER,BEDS OR ON BICYCLES.AT 5.00pm I COME IN AND HAVE MY DINNER WHICH COULD BE STEAK-PIE AND CHIPPED POTATOES.THEN I WATCH THE SIX O'CLOCK NEWS.LATER I GO BACK OUT TO PLAY UNTIL 9.00pm WHEN I COME IN,WATCH TELEVISION, HAVE MY SUPPER AND GO TO BED.
